duties_responsibilities.duty: Deliver company-wide business solutions through application configuration, development, and support activities.
Troubleshoot applications and software for all internal customers, such as finance, operations, supply chain, and other business units.
Define, develop, test, analyze, maintain, and improve in-house and vendor provided software applications.
Research, design, document, and modify software specifications throughout the systems development life cycle.
Analyze and assess existing business systems and procedures.
Assist in defining software development project plans, including scoping, scheduling, and implementation.
Conduct research into software application products and services in support of business requirements.
Recommend, schedule, and perform software improvements and upgrades.
Serve as technical point of contact for ERP application (NetSuite) and provide hands-on support for NetSuite users.
Design and implement technology solutions in NetSuite modules according to business and stakeholder requirements.
Architect, design, build and deliver NetSuite solutions for optimizing the usability and functionality of the system.
Ensure systems integrations with NetSuite are built for scale and maintain accuracy and completeness of data flowing into NetSuite from external systems.
Stay ahead of new NetSuite features, provide recommendations for improvements, and participate in technical design/code reviews & audits.
Maintain user roles/access, build/maintain user interface entry forms, email and PDF templates, and work with end users on usability/ Help Desk issues.
Liaise with vendors for efficient implementation of new software products or systems and resolution of any adaptation issues.
Work with NetSuite and implementation partner teams on automating data integrations with NetSuite.
Ensure systems integrations with NetSuite are built for scale and maintain accuracy and completeness of data.
